result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (3rd) and Operating w/ PAC (3rd). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (3rd) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (3rd) was dismissed by the court.

  • Jeffrey T Rowley was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Jeffrey T Rowley was found guilty of OWI (3rd), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: from Clerk to Defendant re: Court-ordered Payment Arrangements

1:11 pm
No Appearance by Defendant.  Defendant has made payment arrangements.  Court orders Warrant - stay pending compliance with Payment Plan Agreement.
Court adjourned at 1:11 pm

from Clerk to Defendant re: past due payment

ADDRESS INFO for Jeffrey T Rowley
Current: 571 Cty Rd A, c/o Green Lake County Jail, Green Lake, WI 54941 United States  (Effective: 04-08-2016)
Prior: 46850 Hwy 550 Apt 110, Durango, CO 81301

No Contact provision of bond has been canceled.
43
Inmate Request to the Court - approved, signed by the judge

2:58 P.M.  Defendant present in court with Atty Henry Conti.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin. DA recites agreement - defendant will plea to count 1 amended to Disorderly Conduct and count 2 as charged.  Atty Conti concurs.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation. 

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 as amended and count 2.  Court orders count 3 be dismissed.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  DA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Conti.  Statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

Count 2 (OWI-3rd)

-100 days county jail, with huber.
-$1200 fine plus costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Blood Draw Fee - $42.50
-D.L. revocation - 30 months
-IID - 30 months
-AODA

COUNT 1 (DC)

-90 days county jail, with huber and concurrent to the OWI sentence.
-Court costs - Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

Sentence may be served in another county.

Court remands the defendant to the custody of the Green Lake County Jail.

Court adjourned at 3:10

10:27 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Henry Conti present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Conti - still no resolution and requests a preliminary hearing be scheduled.  Court  recites guideines for a 3rd offense OWI.  Court will schedule a hearing in 3-4 weeks.

Court adjourned at 10:32 a.m.

11:49 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Henry Conti present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Conti.  Statement by the Court.  Court will set for Status Hearing on July 20, 2015 at 10:15 A.M.

Court adjourned at 11:52 a.m.

10:14 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Henry Conti present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court notes an amended criminal complaint has been filed.  Statement by Atty Conti - has not received an amended complaint.  Further statement by Atty Conti.  Statement by the Court in regards to recusal - grants ten days if either party requests a recusal.  Court will set for Status Hearing on July 7, 2015 at 11:45 a.m.

Court adjourned at 10:17 a.m.

1:16 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - will be retaining his own attorney and requests more time.  Court will set for status hearing on May 18, 2015 at 1:00 p.m.

Court adjourned at 1:17 p.m.

No Contact with Debra H.  Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision.  Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription

2:54 p.m.  Defendant in custody and present in court via video from the Green Lake County Jail and with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Privaty confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 cash bond and conditions of:  No Contact with Debra H.  Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision.  Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant waives the time limits.  Court will set for Status Hearing on May 4, 2015 at 1:00 p.m.

Court adjourned at 2:57 p.m.
